author: dkhaywood
msg: OptionalFacet renamed to MandatoryFacet, and added in MandatoryFacetDefault and a MandatoryDefaultFacetFactory; updated DefaultFacetFactorySet to call the facet factories in the right order.

author: dkhaywood
msg: OptionalFacet renamed to MandatoryFacet, and added in MandatoryFacetDefault and a MandatoryDefaultFacetFactory; updated DefaultFacetFactorySet to call the facet factories in the right order.

author: dkhaywood
msg: In process of removing OptionalFacet... idea is that the OptionalAnnotationFacetFactory will in fact create a MandatoryFacet if there is NO @Optional annotation; right now have removed MandatoryFacet and will subsequently rename OptionalFacet to MandatoryFacet.
